Docs.summary: Represents the logical negation of a boolean switch.
Docs.value: if the value is logically negated; otherwise, .

example.para: For the VC++ CL task, WholeProgramOptimization is a boolean parameter. It's switch is GL. To disable whole program optimization, you need to pass the ReverseSwitch, which is GL-.
